properties.title: Africa
properties.description:
The Africa Region covers 37 sub-Saharan countries and a population of over 800 million through 11,400 service points.

Results by region, 2012

  • 39,473,382 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided
  • 2,370,768 couple years of protection (CYP)
  • 14,581,128 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided to young people under 25 years
  • 7,107,781 HIV-related services provided
  • 227,576,575 condoms distributed
  • 316,693 abortion‑related services provided

To find out more about IPPF's work in Africa, go to www.ippfar.org

properties.title: Arab World
properties.description:
The Arab World Region covers 14 countries with diverse socio-cultural challenges.

Results by region, 2012

  • 2,821,454 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided
  • 287,345 couple years of protection (CYP)
  • 1,303,746 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided to young people under 25 years
  • 439,801 HIV-related services provided
  • 395,845 condoms distributed
  • 46,763 abortion‑related services provided

To find out more about IPPF's work in the Arab World, go to: www.ippfawr.org

properties.title: East and South East Asia and Oceania
properties.description:
The East and South East Asia and Oceania Region encompasses 22 countries and delivers services through 8,300 service points.

Results by region, 2012

  • 15,616,282 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided
  • 755,973 couple years of protection (CYP)
  • 5,395,490 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided to young people under 25 years
  • 3,267,370 HIV-related services provided
  • 30,026,771 condoms distributed
  • 173,408 abortion‑related services provided

To find out more about IPPF's work in the region, go to: www.ippfeseaor.org

properties.title: South Asia
properties.description:
The South Asia Region covers 9 countries, including some of the most populous countries in the world, and operates nearly 19,000 service points.

Results by region, 2012

  • 18,576,517 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided
  • 2,304,131 couple years of protection (CYP)
  • 8,779,415 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided to young people under 25 years
  • 1,853,655 HIV-related services provided
  • 35,835,701 condoms distributed
  • 298,303 abortion‑related services provided

To find out more about IPPF's work in South Asia, go to: www.ippfsar.org

properties.title: European Network
properties.description:
The European Network comprises 41 Member Associations in Europe and Central Asia, encompassing the EU, EU accession states and the whole of Russia.

Results by region, 2012

  • 1,730,329 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided
  • 41,068 couple years of protection (CYP)
  • 841,979 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided to young people under 25 years
  • 203,697 HIV-related services provided
  • 984,747 condoms distributed
  • 106,969 abortion‑related services provided

To find out more about IPPF's work in Europe, go to: www.ippfen.org

properties.title: Western Hemisphere
properties.ro: New York, United States of America
properties.description:
The 38 countries in the Western Hemisphere Region present a variety of challenging policy environments and service delivery issues. Collectively, the Member Associations operate 25,000 service points.

Results by region, 2012

  • 34,491,529 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided
  • 6,046,977 couple years of protection (CYP)
  • 14,168,895 sexual and reproductive health services (including contraception) provided to young people under 25 years
  • 6,278,658 HIV-related services provided
  • 64,486,539 condoms distributed
  • 1,172,693 abortion‑related services provided

To find out more about IPPF's work in this region, go to: www.ippfwhr.org
